Class GaussianInputFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • InputFileFormat
      • GaussianInputFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFormat, Immutable

    public class GaussianInputFile
extends InputFileFormat
    Represent a Gaussian input file for debugging purposes.

      • getGaussianString

        private static java.lang.String getGaussianString(Molecule molecule,
                                 java.util.Set<Atom> includeAtoms)
        Writes a gjf file that only includes part of the molecule.
        Parameters:
        molecule - the molecule whose geometry we want to write partially
        includeAtoms - the atoms to include the result
        Returns:
        a String containing a gjf that only includes includeAtoms
